title: Work Day Scheduler
information: This project involved creating a work day scheduler using HTML, CSS, JS. Use this to plan your working day!

title: Weather Forecast Dashboard
information: This app uses an API call to Open Weather and displays current weather conditions and a five-day forecast.

title: Coding Student Quiz
information: This project involved creating a quiz using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

title: Music Webpage
information: One of my aims is to produce a website to showcase my upcoming shows.
